parameters.name: samplePlan
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Path to input TSV file on mapping, recalibrate and variant calling steps. Multiple TSV files can be specified with quotes. Works also with the path to a directory on mapping step with a single germline sample only. Alternatively, path to VCF input file on annotate step. Multiple VCF files can be specified with quotes

parameters.name: design
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Path to input TSV file on mapping, recalibrate and variant calling steps. Multiple TSV files can be specified with quotes. Works also with the path to a directory on mapping step with a single germline sample only. Alternatively, path to VCF input file on annotate step. Multiple VCF files can be specified with quotes

parameters.name: profile
parameters.label: Configuration profile(s)
parameters.usage: Configuration profile to use. Can use multiple (comma separated).

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Genome reference
parameters.usage: Name of Genome reference

parameters.name: noGVCF
parameters.label: No g.vcf files
parameters.usage: No g.vcf output from HaplotypeCaller

parameters.name: noIntervals
parameters.label: No intervals
parameters.usage: Disable usage of intervals

parameters.name: nucleotidesPerSecond
parameters.label: Nucleotides per second
parameters.usage: To estimate interval size

parameters.name: targetBED
parameters.label: Target BED file
parameters.usage: Target BED file for targeted or whole exome sequencing

parameters.name: step
parameters.label: Starting step
parameters.usage: Specify starting step

parameters.name: tools
parameters.label: Variant calling tools
parameters.usage: Specify tools to use for variant calling

parameters.name: skipQC
parameters.label: Skip QC Tools
parameters.usage: Specify which QC tools to skip

parameters.name: SVFilters
parameters.label: SV Filters
parameters.usage: Specify which filter to use for SV

parameters.name: SNVFilters
parameters.label: SNV Filters
parameters.usage: Specify which filter to use for SNV

parameters.name: annotateTools
parameters.label: Annotate specific tools
parameters.usage: Specify from which tools it will look for VCF files to annotate (only for step annotate)

parameters.name: snpEffCache
parameters.label: Path to SnpEff cache
parameters.usage: Specity the path to snpEff cache

parameters.name: pon
parameters.label: Panel of Normal VCF
parameters.usage: Panel-of-normals VCF (bgzipped, indexed). See: https://software.broadinstitute.org/gatk/documentation/tooldocs/current/org_broadinstitute_hellbender_tools_walkers_mutect_CreateSomaticPanelOfNormals.php

parameters.name: ponIndex
parameters.label: PON index
parameters.usage: Index of pon panel-of-normals VCF

parameters.name: acLoci
parameters.label: acLoci file
parameters.usage: acLoci file

parameters.name: acLociGC
parameters.label: acLociGC file
parameters.usage: acLociGC file

parameters.name: bwaIndex
parameters.label: BWA indexes
parameters.usage: BWA indexes. If none provided, will be generated automatically from the fasta reference

parameters.name: dbsnp
parameters.label: DBSNP file
parameters.usage: DBSNP file

parameters.name: dbsnpIndex
parameters.label: DBSNP index file
parameters.usage: DBSNP index file. If none provided, will be generated automatically if a dbsnp file is provided

parameters.name: dict
parameters.label: Dict from the fasta reference
parameters.usage: Dict from the fasta reference, If none provided, will be generated automatically from the fasta reference

parameters.name: fasta
parameters.label: Fasta reference
parameters.usage: Fasta reference

parameters.name: fastafai
parameters.label: Fasta reference index
parameters.usage: Fasta reference index. If none provided, will be generated automatically from the fasta reference

parameters.name: germlineResource
parameters.label: Germline Resource File
parameters.usage: Germline Resource File

parameters.name: germlineResourceIndex
parameters.label: Germline Resource Index File
parameters.usage: Germline Resource Index File. If none provided, will be generated automatically if a germlineResource file is provided

parameters.name: intervals
parameters.label: Intervals
parameters.usage: Intervals. If none provided, will be generated automatically from the fasta reference. Use --noIntervals to disable automatic generation

parameters.name: knownIndels
parameters.label: knownIndels File
parameters.usage: knownIndels File

parameters.name: knownIndelsIndex
parameters.label: knownIndels Index File
parameters.usage: knownIndels Index File. If none provided, will be generated automatically if a knownIndels file is provided

parameters.name: snpeffDb
parameters.label: snpeffDb version
parameters.usage: snpeffDb version. Initialized from genomes configuration by default

parameters.name: outputDir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: The output directory where the results will be saved

parameters.name: sequencingCenter
parameters.label: Sequencing center name
parameters.usage: Name of sequencing center to be displayed in BAM file

parameters.name: multiqcConfig
parameters.label: MultiQC configuration File
parameters.usage: Specify a custom config file for MultiQC

parameters.name: monochromeLogs
parameters.label: Monochrome Logs
parameters.usage: Logs will be without colors

parameters.name: email
parameters.label: Email
parameters.usage: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits

parameters.name: maxMultiqcEmailFileSize
parameters.label: Max Multiqc Email File Size
parameters.usage: Theshold size for MultiQC report to be attached in notification email. If file generated by pipeline exceeds the threshold, it will not be attached (Default: 25MB)

parameters.name: name
parameters.label: Name for the pipeline run
parameters.usage: Name for the pipeline run. If not specified, Nextflow will automatically generate a random mnemonic
